Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes the New York state park adopt-a-trail stewardship program and the New York state park adopt-a-trail stewardship program fund
Summary: Establishes the New York state park adopt-a-trail stewardship program and the New York state park adopt-a-trail stewardship program fund.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add ยง3.27, Pks & Rec L; add ยง97-wwww, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to establishing the New York state park adopt-a-trail stewardship program; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the state park adopt-a-trail stewardship program fund
